column5: Can someone tell me the approximate weight of the Strike King Series 4S crankbait and the Series 1XS? What would other common baits weigh like Rapala Husky Jerk Bait, etc....  Thanks.....Dirk....
4S  is 3/8 oz   Series 1 is 1/4 oz.  For most baits such as the Rapala baits  the weights are given for each size on the manufacturer's website.

I bought a digital kitchen scale a couple of weeks ago at Canadian Tire for $10. I use it to weight all my plugs/lures.  I think that the price went back to $20, even at that price it's a good scale to have a round the house.  muddler

I wanted to avoid getting a digital scale for obbvious reasons byt that price sounds reasonable. Might have to go get one. Thanks.  Roy...awsome info on the Rapala site, never actually went to their site before. Thanks....
im afraid of scales, for 1 obvious reason.
Why are we weighing our lures?
